name: Friends with Money
description: After she quits her lucrative job, Olivia finds herself unsure about her future and her relationships with her successful and wealthy friends.
keywords: money problems,marital problem,french maid costume,nervous breakdown,friendship

review.author: BenCurtisActor
review.heading: Great female leads. Weak everything else.
review.reviewBody: The women were awesome however the script seemed a bit incomplete and the story ended abruptly. Frances MacDormand is amazing. A feel good movie with a sweet undertone.
